publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-686 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees- (a) that Stage 1 of the Local Governance (Scotland) Bill be completed by 2 April 2004; and (b) that Stage 1 of the National Health Service Reform (Scotland) Bill be completed by 5 March 2004. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
